name: Riavvolgi il Nastro (LocJAM WMHD) [IT]
description:
Italian entry for the LocJAM World Mental Health Day.

Team members:

  • Irene Tomasi: MTPE, (some) transcreation and messing around with the HTML code
  • Francesca Mele: additional editing and revising

Francesca and I are back again for a LocJAM after our first experience during the LocJAM RPG (you can find our entry here).

This time we have identified our ideal target audience in all those who grew up with VHS. Indeed, we believe that many young people nowadays have clearer ideas about consent than older people. Many of our friends and colleagues, in fact, seem to lack the tools to speak coherently about it and, finding the source material of this jam extremely useful, we want to dedicate this localization to them.

Additionally, we have used Matecat and its integrated MT, so this is also our first real attempt at MTPE with a bit of transcreation on the side.
